title: Dual Contrast Pedagogy (DCP)-Based Program for Enhancing AI Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Language domain-focused education for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, combining offline activities and online collaborative learning via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain AI system operations (machine learning, conversational AI) by contrasting them with human cognitive processes.
Learners can analyze ethical issues in everyday AI applications and propose alternative solutions.
Learners improve AI-related learning confidence and intrinsic motivation by over 20% through the DCP instructional method.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
